thread.title: Megan Cruz
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Megan Cruz

author: Megan Cruz
title: Megan Cruz
text: The Auburn Hills, MI location had wonderful customer service. Jason Fischer helped us during both of our visits, never making us feel rushed or pressured into buying more than we came for. We purchased a Serta iComfort and sectional couch. The delivery men both times were very professional and helpful. These were our first purchases with Gardner White, but they won't be our last.
